abstract: Academy of Motion Picture Arts and Sciences says it will present honorary Oscars to Jackie Chan, Anne V Coates, Frederick Wiseman and Lynn Salmaster at its November Governors Awards; organization also announces contract with ABC to televise Oscar ceremony through 2028.

keywords.value: Academy of Motion Picture Arts and Sciences
keywords.name: organizations

lead_paragraph: Mr. Chan will join the film editor Anne V. Coates, the documentarian Frederick Wiseman and the casting director Lynn Stalmaster in being honored at the Governors Awards.
snippet: Mr. Chan will join the film editor Anne V. Coates, the documentarian Frederick Wiseman and the casting director Lynn Stalmaster in being honored at the Governors Awards....

headline.main: Jackie Chan Is Among Winners of Honorary Oscars
headline.print_headline: Martial Arts Actor and Prolific Documentarian on List of Honorary Oscar Winners
